verses.text: And it came to pass, when \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* was \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* from \w following|strong="H0310"\w* the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, that it was \w told|strong="H5046"\w* him, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold, \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \add is\add* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* of \w En-gedi|strong="H5872"\w*.\f + \fr 24.1 \ft following: Heb. after\f*

Then \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* out of all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w went|strong="H3212"\w* to \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* and his \w men|strong="H0582"\w* \w upon|strong="H6440"\w* the \w rocks|strong="H6697"\w* of the wild \w goats|strong="H3277"\w*.

And he \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w sheepcotes|strong="H1448"\w* by the \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, where \add was\add* a \w cave|strong="H4631"\w*; and \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* went \w in|strong="H0935"\w* to \w cover|strong="H5526"\w* his \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*: and \w David|strong="H1732"\w* and his \w men|strong="H0582"\w* \w remained|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w sides|strong="H3411"\w* of the \w cave|strong="H4631"\w*.

And the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Behold the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto thee, Behold, I will \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* thine \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w* into thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, that thou mayest \w do|strong="H6213"\w* to him as it shall seem \w good|strong="H3190"\w* unto \w thee|strong="H5869"\w*. Then \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w arose|strong="H6965"\w*, and cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* the \w skirt|strong="H3671"\w* of \w Saul’s|strong="H7586"\w* \w robe|strong="H4598"\w* \w privily|strong="H3909"\w*.\f + \fr 24.4 \ft Saul’s…: Heb. the robe which was Saul’s\f*

And it came to pass \w afterward|strong="H0310"\w*, that \w David’s|strong="H1732"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* him, because he had cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w Saul’s|strong="H7586"\w* \w skirt|strong="H3671"\w*.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto his \w men|strong="H0582"\w*, The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w forbid|strong="H2486"\w* that I should \w do|strong="H6213"\w* this \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* unto my \w master|strong="H0113"\w*, the 
d \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w anointed|strong="H4899"\w*, to stretch \w forth|strong="H7971"\w* mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* against him, seeing he \add is\add* the \w anointed|strong="H4899"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

So \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w stayed|strong="H8156"\w* his \w servants|strong="H0582"\w* with these \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, and \w suffered|strong="H5414"\w* them not to \w rise|strong="H6965"\w* against \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*. But \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* rose \w up|strong="H6965"\w* out of the \w cave|strong="H4631"\w*, and \w went|strong="H3212"\w* on \add his\add* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*.\f + \fr 24.7 \ft stayed: Heb. cut off\f*

\w David|strong="H1732"\w* also \w arose|strong="H6965"\w* afterward, and went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of the \w cave|strong="H4631"\w*, and \w cried|strong="H7121"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, My \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*. And when \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w looked|strong="H5027"\w* \w behind|strong="H0310"\w* him, \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w stooped|strong="H6915"\w* with his \w face|strong="H0639"\w* to the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, and \w bowed|strong="H7812"\w* himself.

¶ And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, Wherefore \w hearest|strong="H8085"\w* thou \w men’s|strong="H0120"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold, \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w seeketh|strong="H1245"\w* thy \w hurt|strong="H7451"\w*?

Behold, this \w day|strong="H3117"\w* thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* have \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* how that the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* had \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* thee to \w day|strong="H3117"\w* into mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* in the \w cave|strong="H4631"\w*: and \add some\add* \w bade|strong="H0559"\w* \add me\add* \w kill|strong="H2026"\w* thee: but \add mine eye\add* \w spared|strong="H2347"\w* thee; and I \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I will not put \w forth|strong="H7971"\w* mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* against my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*; for he \add is\add* the 
d \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w anointed|strong="H4899"\w*.

Moreover, my \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, \w see|strong="H7200"\w*, yea, \w see|strong="H7200"\w* the \w skirt|strong="H3671"\w* of thy \w robe|strong="H4598"\w* in my \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*: for in that I cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* the \w skirt|strong="H3671"\w* of thy \w robe|strong="H4598"\w*, and \w killed|strong="H2026"\w* thee not, \w know|strong="H3045"\w* thou and \w see|strong="H7200"\w* that \add there is\add* neither \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* nor \w transgression|strong="H6588"\w* in mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and I have not \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* against thee; yet thou \w huntest|strong="H6658"\w* my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* to \w take|strong="H3947"\w* it.

The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* between me and thee, and the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w avenge|strong="H5358"\w* me of thee: but mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* shall not be upon thee.

As \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w proverb|strong="H4912"\w* of the \w ancients|strong="H6931"\w*, \w Wickedness|strong="H7562"\w* \w proceedeth|strong="H3318"\w* from the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*: but mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* shall not be upon thee.

\w After|strong="H0310"\w* whom is the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* come \w out|strong="H3318"\w*? \w after|strong="H0310"\w* whom dost thou \w pursue|strong="H7291"\w*? \w after|strong="H0310"\w* a \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* \w dog|strong="H3611"\w*, \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w a|strong="H0259"\w* \w flea|strong="H6550"\w*.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* therefore be \w judge|strong="H1781"\w*, and \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* between me and thee, and \w see|strong="H7200"\w*, and \w plead|strong="H7378"\w* my \w cause|strong="H7379"\w*, and \w deliver|strong="H8199"\w* me out of thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.\f + \fr 24.15 \ft deliver: Heb. judge\f*

¶ And it came to pass, when \w David|strong="H1732"\w* had made an \w end|strong="H3615"\w* of \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w* these \w words|strong="H1697"\w* unto \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, that \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \add Is\add* this thy \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, my \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*? And \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* lifted \w up|strong="H5375"\w* his \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, and \w wept|strong="H1058"\w*.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, Thou \add art\add* more \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* than I: for thou hast \w rewarded|strong="H1580"\w* me \w good|strong="H2896"\w*, whereas I have \w rewarded|strong="H1580"\w* thee \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*.

And thou hast \w shewed|strong="H5046"\w* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w* how that thou hast \w dealt|strong="H6213"\w* \w well|strong="H2896"\w* with me: forasmuch as when the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had \w delivered|strong="H5462"\w* me into thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, thou \w killedst|strong="H2026"\w* me not.\f + \fr 24.18 \ft delivered: Heb. shut up\f*

For if a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* his \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w*, will he let him \w go|strong="H7971"\w* \w well|strong="H2896"\w* \w away|strong="H1870"\w*? wherefore the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w reward|strong="H7999"\w* thee \w good|strong="H2896"\w* for that thou hast \w done|strong="H6213"\w* unto me this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

And now, behold, I know \w well|strong="H3045"\w* that thou shalt \w surely|strong="H4427"\w* be \w king|strong="H4427"\w*, and that the \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* shall be \w established|strong="H6965"\w* in thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w Swear|strong="H7650"\w* now therefore unto me by the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, that thou wilt \w not|strong="H0518"\w* cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* my \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* me, and that thou wilt not \w destroy|strong="H8045"\w* my \w name|strong="H8034"\w* out of my \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w sware|strong="H7650"\w* unto \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*. And \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w home|strong="H1004"\w*; but \w David|strong="H1732"\w* and his \w men|strong="H0582"\w* gat them \w up|strong="H5927"\w* unto the \w hold|strong="H4686"\w*.
